title: Monsters First Submission
description: Monsters First CompThis is my first notebook on Kaggle.  I am creating it to explore the Kaggle environment.  Newcomers to Kaggle follow along with me as I learn how to use a Kaggle notebook.  I am also very new to machine learning and this looked like a fairly easy data set to start with So I am going to play with a few different classifiers. I found it very cool how SciKit Learn works and how easy it is to plug in a different classifier.
